snippet: New York City legislators propose a bill to require braking devices for elevators and more regulation over the workers that service them.
abstract: New York City legislators propose bill to require braking devices for elevators and more regulation over workers that service them in response to two elevator deaths in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: New York City legislators propose a bill to require braking devices for elevators and more regulation over the workers that service them.

headline.seo: Bill Proposes Elevator Technicians Be Licensed in New York City
headline.main: Licensing Push After 2 Deaths From Elevators
headline.print_headline: Licensing Push After 2 Deaths From Elevators
